sent.orig: Teaching Subjects include Basketball, Soccer, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Handball, Squash, Tennis and Physical Conditioning.
sent.trans: 任教课程包括篮球、足球、排球、乒乓球、手球、壁球、网球、体能锻鍊。

sent.orig: Shanghai Qizhong Forest Sports City Tennis Centre (Tennis)
sent.trans: 上海旗忠森林体育城网球中心（网球）

sent.orig: There is a tennis match on the tennis court.
sent.trans: 网球场上有一场网球比赛。

sent.orig: I am not interested in tennis. I like table tennis best.
sent.trans: 我对网球不感兴趣。我最喜欢乒乓球。

sent.orig: He was appointed head coach of the tennis team after they won the world tennis tournament.
sent.trans: 在赢得世界网球锦标赛之后，他被任命为主教练。
